item.description: 每日商机推送（周四全量）

sql-item.sql: SELECT a.user_id ,a.user_name ,a.supplier_id ,a.openid ,b.area_code From `b2b_bidding`.`bid_recruit_biz_opps_clean` a LEFT JOIN ( select DISTINCT created_by from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register where date(created_time)>date(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -7 DAY)) ) r on a.user_id=r.created_by left join ( select user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(area_code) as area_code From b2b_user.`uuc_user_attention_area` where area_code<>0 GROUP BY user_id ) b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.type='total' and r.created_by is null and a.openid is not null

SELECT CONCAT('●',GROUP_CONCAT(nr SEPARATOR '●')) as nr,concat('&zbid=',ifnull(GROUP_CONCAT(if(type=1,itemId,null)),''),'&zmid=',ifnull(GROUP_CONCAT(if(type=2,itemId,null)),'')) as ids FROM ( select CONCAT('【',company_name,'】','发布了','【',title,'】','\r\n') as nr , itemId,type from ( SELECT DISTINCT b.item_id as itemId, CONCAT(d.category_name,'招募') as title , ifnull(c.short_name,c.company_name) as company_name, c.developer_type AS developerType, 2 as type ,FIND_IN_SET(area.province_code,@area_code) as orderbys,b.register_end_date FROM b2b_op_activity.op_fit_my_recruit a INNER JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item b ON a.item_id = b.item_id left join ( select item_id from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register where supplier_id = @supplier_id ) r on b.item_id=r.item_id INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer c ON b.company_id = c.developer_id inner join b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_area area on b.item_id=area.item_id INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest d on b.categories=d.category_code WHERE a.supplier_id = @supplier_id and a.is_complete_meet=1 and r.item_id is null and b.register_end_date>now() AND c.company_name not like 'test_%' GROUP BY c.company_name ORDER BY type,!orderbys,register_end_date ) a LIMIT 3 ) z HAVING COUNT(1)>=1
